name: tactical-dice
description:
Entry for GMTK game jam 2022.

Game has a how-to, but basicly:
Use the buttons at the bottom left to get rid of all the evil red guys.

Game was build using React, combined with the react-game-engine library to run game loops (yes its 100% a HTML webpage, no canvas or real game engine).

Stuff made by others that I've used (and have rights to use):

  • Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/chiptunes/rising-hero/ 
  • Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/gamer-beats/hard-mode/
  • Dice sprite:  https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/6923039-dice-game-line-icon-set-pipped-dices-toss-from-one-to-six-die-for-casino-craps-table-or-board-games-luck-and-random-choice-vector-illustration-isolated 
  • Dice rolling sound: https://freesound.org/people/Flem0527/sounds/629982/
  • Icons: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/game-icons-expansion
